name: drupal/ckeditor5_premium_features
description: The premium features for the CKEditor 5 WYSIWYG editor.

suggest.firebase/php-jwt: Required for Real-time collaboration and document converters.
suggest.caxy/php-htmldiff: Required for asynchronous collaboration and notifications.
suggest.openai-php/client: Required for OpenAI an AzureAI providers for the AI Assistant.
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Required for AWS Bedrock provider for the AI Assistant.
